## Conversation.deleteMember() method

Delete the member from this conversation (requires `ConversationMemberFlags.IsOwner`<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteMember(memberId: ConversationMember['id']): Promise<void>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberId | [ConversationMember](./client.conversationmember.md)<!-- -->\['id'\] | The conversation member identifier |
